review.title: “Rewarding job with great pay hut no benefits.”
review.pros: Pros – A company with a ton of knowledge of the nightlife industry. They offer excellent pay and very rewarding benefits and contacts. Plenty of room for growth and advancement.
review.cons: Cons – Very little down time and not much of a personal life.
review.advice-to-management: Advice to Senior Management – Management is great and very understanding. Everyone likes to have fun and make money doing it.
